Author: Neonmaelstrom
Text: hey im a bit late but you definitely arent a failure, dont forget that the reason she felt full after half a plate was because she probably had a normal breakfast and lunch (or not lunch, depending on if you were eating the pasta for lunch or dinner)  meanwhile you had been fasting which means that your hunger is totally justified and you should not worry about eating the plate of pasta, i hope that it tasted good? <3
